1513519731_1FFMmVeZe5E8yhkPxtn3ndZhrW8J8.body: Currently we're building the organization looking for people who play Star Citizen or Space Engineers. Currently we're renting a server for Space Engineers and have assets in there. It's slow going but we're making progress. Star Citizen isn't even out and I'd like to see us "established" before the game launches.

"Undercover Federation work?" 

Think space pirates lol

If you have a mic we also have a public discord. Currently thinking of how to include that info on the site. Here is the invite link. It's a public channel with people signed up but not that many active your welcome to join though.
